issue.title: [Dev] Link our nightly reports info to Jira
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13063](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13063). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Jira has an API — we should try and use that to match jira tickets with builds (e.g. "this build will be fixed when issue Y is solved, so don't alert unless Y is marked as resolved and the build is still failing").

This is similar to ARROW-8043, but is specific to this information repository
